DOC.brief_summary: RATIONALE : Telephone session survivorship booklet may increase knowledge psychological physical impact breast cancer increase awareness available resource . It yet know whether survivorship booklet effective give alone together individual telephone session inform breast cancer survivor . PURPOSE : This randomized clinical trial study individual telephone session give together survivorship booklet compare survivorship booklet alone see well work increase knowledge impact breast cancer African American Latina breast cancer survivor .
DOC.brief_title: Survivorship Booklets With Without Individual Telephone Sessions Increasing Knowledge About Impact Breast Cancer African American Latina Breast Cancer Survivors
DOC.detailed_description: OBJECTIVES : Primary - Evaluate utility individual telephone session plus survivorship booklet versus survivorship booklet alone increase knowledge psychological physical impact breast cancer increase awareness appropriate psychological medical resource among African American Latina breast cancer survivor . - Evaluate utility intervention improve psychological functioning ( depression anxiety ) among breast cancer survivor . - Evaluate utility intervention improve family social functioning ( change family partner communication ) among breast cancer survivor . Secondary - Evaluate predictor health-related quality life ( demographic , medical care factor , psychological , socio-ecological , socio-cultural factor ) within across breast cancer survivor ethnic group identify general ethnic-specific correlate . OUTLINE : Patients stratify accord ethnicity ( African American v Latina ) . Patients randomize 1 2 group . - Group 1 : Patients receive survivorship kit booklet English Spanish . Patients receive follow-up telephone call approximately 2 month clarify issue relevant survivorship kit booklet . - Group 2 : Patients participate 8 weekly telephone session address basic breast cancer information ; education psychological medical effect cancer treatment ; resource include psychosocial , medical care facility , clinical trial information ; stress management relaxation ; cognitive reframing concern behavioral strategy ; family communication ; relational communication intimacy ; social support . Patients also receive survivorship kit booklet group 1 . After completion study intervention , patient complete follow-up questionnaire 4 6 month .
DOC.criteria: DISEASE CHARACTERISTICS : Diagnosed breast cancer within past 15 year Stage IIIIA disease No metastatic disease PATIENT CHARACTERISTICS : No major disable medical ( e.g. , another cancer , stroke , heart disease ) psychiatric condition Selfidentified ethnically AfricanAmerican Latina Able read and/or speak English Spanish No severe depression anxiety History mild moderate depression anxiety allow Not pregnant Not incarcerate PRIOR CONCURRENT THERAPY : Any type prior anticancer therapy allow
